items.content_html: Note Capture is a lightweight Chrome extension designed to simplify your online research and note-taking process. With noteCapture, you can easily highlight text on any webpage and save it directly to your Google Docs or Google Notebook. Stay organized, boost your productivity, and access your saved notes anywhere, anytime.
items.title: lenfontes/Note-Capture: Note Capture is a lightweight Chrome extension designed to simplify your online research and note-taking process. With noteCapture, you can easily highlight text on any webpage and save it directly to your Google Docs or Google Notebook. Stay organized, boost your productivity, and access your saved notes anywhere, anytime.
